nodes.text: Vald Inosp was a male Human Jedi who lived during the Cold War. He fell to the dark side and was present on Korriban where he met his demise at the hands of a Sith Acolyte.

Vald Inosp appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Korriban. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
